titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the The Search for Jane's Cold Cream Jar: An Archaeological Adventure at the Stanfords' Palo Alto Home
Search for Jane's Cold Cream Jar: An Archaeological Adventure at the Stanfords' Palo Alto Home

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: The search for Jane's cold cream jar: an archaeological adventure at the Stanfords' Palo Alto home
did.abstract: The Search for Jane's cold Cream Jar is an interactive CD containing images and information about the history, artifacts, and archaeology of the Stanfords' Palo Alto home.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: The Search for Jane's Cold Cream Jar: An Archaeological Adventure at the Stanfords' Palo Alto Home (SC1088). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Stanford University archaeology field classes conducted a dig from 1995-2001 at the site of Jane and Leland Stanford's campus home. The archeological team included Laura Jones, Elena Reese, Carol Porter, Gilbert Borrego, and volunteers and students.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Search for Jane's cold Cream Jar is an interactive CD containing images and information about the history, artifacts, and archaeology of the Stanfords' Palo Alto home.
